# The Invisible Users - Web Resources

> Project news and updates

**Last updated:** January 2026
**Author:** Tom Cranstoun
**LinkedIn:** https://www.linkedin.com/in/tom-cranstoun/

**Site Type:** Project Updates, News, Technical Documentation
**Purpose:** Developer Education, AI Agent Compatibility, Web Design Best Practices
**Status:** Active project website

## About

This directory contains public web pages for "The Invisible Users: Designing the Web for AI Agents and Everyone Else" by Tom Cranstoun.

The book examines how modern web design optimized for human users fails for AI agents, and how fixing this benefits everyone.

**Contact:** tom.cranstoun@gmail.com
**Website:** https://allabout.network

## Main Pages

- Project News: https://allabout.network/invisible-users/web/news.html - Latest updates and announcements

## Complete Book Resources

For the complete book content, appendices, implementation guides, and technical documentation, see:

- Book Main Page: https://allabout.network/invisible-users/web/index.html
- Complete llms.txt: https://allabout.network/invisible-users/web/llms.txt
- Appendices Index: https://allabout.network/invisible-users/web/appendix-index.html

## Topics

AI agents, web design, web accessibility, agent-mediated commerce, semantic HTML, structured data, identity delegation, browser automation, llms.txt, implementation patterns
